name: Iridescent (FMC999)
description:
A platformer about changing your perception on things to traverse various challenges and about meeting some quirky characters that help bring colour back into your world.

My first foray into pixel art and also my most 'complete' and polished work to date.

I would've loved to make it a longer experience (maybe around 20-30 minutes) but due to various limitations that wasn't possible at the time. Maybe one day I will come back and make a longer version, but that won't be for a while yet.

Music used, in order:
Spiritual Moment - purple-planet.com
Heartfelt - purple-planet.com
Maelstrom - Freesfx.co.uk
Thanks for Everything - purple-planet.com

Font used in the game : Pixel FJVerdana from 1001fonts.com
